Companion Notes:
Large Evolution: Size is Large: gains +8 Str, +4 Con, +1 AC, +1 CMB/CMD, and 10' reach; suffers -2 Dex, -1 Attack, -2 Fly, -4 Stealth
Limbs (Legs) Evolution: Has 1 pairs of legs; +10 speed
Ability Score Increase: +2 distributed among eidolon abilities
Breath Weapon Evolution: 30' cone or 60' line inflicts 8d6 HP of chosen energy type (DC 17 Ref half) 1/dy
Claws Evolution: Claw attacks inflicts 1d6+13 HP each
Companion Darkvision: 60' b/w vision in darkness
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Devotion: +4 Will vs. enchantment
Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
Limbs (Arms) Evolution: Has 1 pairs of arms
Link (Summoner): May communicate on same plane w/eidolon over any distance/Shares magic item slots w/eidolon
Multiattack: Reduce additional attack penalty to -2 or second attack at -5
Share Spells (Summoner): May cast spells that affect self on eidolon as touch spells
Slam Evolution: Slam attacks inflict 2d6+13 HP each
Spell Resistance Evolution: Has Spell Resistance 21
Tentacle Evolution: Tentacle attacks inflict 1d6+9 HP each
